column5: These lil gems came in the mail today! Can't wait to use them bass fishing!!!! Thanks very much Chris! I'll be ordering from you again soon! ( i have a feeling 6 wasn't enough lol).
For reference of the website. The orange colour i requested
Christopher dose great flys. That craw is very cool. What size is it?

its a larger one upon my request. I'd guess 2.75". I'm not a fly fisherman. I want these for one specific spot that I'll be fishing on light spinning tackle:) he even bulked them up for me  Nice. Im thinking your targeting eyes with that up your way. They look like a great smallie bait. Like you said,on a light spinning reel combo. I LIKE.
